meanings.definition: A position or attitude from which something is considered or evaluated.
meanings.sent1: From different standpoints, we can see the situation in various ways.
meanings.sent2: She always looks at things from her own unique standpoint.
meanings.sent3: His standpoint on eating dessert before dinner is quite unconventional.
meanings.sent4: The standpoint of the artist brought a new light to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept using different standpoints to help us understand better.

meanings.definition: A mental position from which things are viewed or considered.
meanings.sent1: Their standpoints on the issue were completely opposite.
meanings.sent2: He tried to understand her standpoint before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The cat's standpoint on sharing its toys was quite clear.
meanings.sent4: From her standpoint, the decision seemed obvious.
meanings.sent5: The standpoint of the detective helped solve the mystery quickly.
